amendment.description: To remove the authorization of appropriations for such sums as may be necessary.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4142 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4142 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Moran. To remove the authorization of appropriations for such sums as may be necessary.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4142 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Moran.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4142 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
